title: The Humiliating Reason Sanctions On North Korea Have Failed To Achieve Anything Other Than Kill Civilians
description: I have been shocked by the reaction when I raise the lethal human cost of sanctions against North Korea with political figures I know. They tend to come back with a vociferous attack on the government in Pyongyang and its leader Kim Jong Un. Not ...
